overview: Tara Ashley - Stepdad realizes Tara isn't wearing a bra He demands she peel of her schoolgirl uniform and try on bras. Jillian Janson- Jillian goes to her graduation wearing only her birthday suit under her gown so she could flash the audience. Alex Blake - Alex and her sister Tara are fighting when stepdad comes to see what's going on. Rose Darling - Rose is feeling naughty as she wears her school uniform without a bra or any panties. Pyper Prentice - Pyper is sent to her room for being sassy and dressing slutty.
tagline: Sometimes punishment is a win-win situation.
title: Bad Teens Punished 8
